message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the enthusiasm behind it, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $150 for the product. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, I understand that $250 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm thinking of selling the product for $200. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I still believe we can come to an even better agreement. I would like to propose a price of $180 for the product. I hope this meets within your expectations.

Hi Bob, I'm glad we're having a good conversation! I'm willing to meet you at $190, but I have to say, I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting close to the price I was thinking of selling it to John for. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal.

Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a final price of $170 for the product. This feels like a fair compromise for both of us. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Hi Bob, I think we're really close now! I'm willing to meet you at $185, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. I'm starting to think that selling it to you is a better option than selling it to John at $150, so I'm willing to make a bit of a concession to make it happen.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I believe we've reached a point where both of our interests are being considered. I would like to propose a final price of $180 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to conclude this transaction.
